name: mailshieldai
description: AI-powered email security dashboard that detects and analyzes phishing threats in real-time

scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web -c blue,green "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.dev:api: cd apps/api && source ../../.venv/bin/activate && PYTHONPATH=../.. uvicorn main:app --reload --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8000
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n api,web,ingest,intent,action,analyses,aggregator -c blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan,red,white "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:ingest" "npm run dev:intent" "npm run dev:action" "npm run dev:analyses" "npm run dev:aggregator"
scripts.dev:ingest: cd apps/worker/ingest && source ../../../.venv/bin/activate && PYTHONPATH=../../.. uvicorn main:app --reload --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8001
scripts.dev:intent: cd apps/worker/intent && source ../../../.venv/bin/activate && PYTHONPATH=../../.. uvicorn main:app --reload --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8002
scripts.dev:action: cd apps/worker/action && source ../../../.venv/bin/activate && PYTHONPATH=../../.. uvicorn main:app --reload --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8003
scripts.dev:analyses: cd apps/worker/analyses && source ../../../.venv/bin/activate && PYTHONPATH=../../.. uvicorn main:app --reload --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8004
scripts.dev:aggregator: cd apps/worker/aggregator && source ../../../.venv/bin/activate && PYTHONPATH=../../.. uvicorn main:app --reload --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8005
scripts.start:all: concurrently -n api,ingest,intent,action,analyses,aggregator -c blue,yellow,magenta,cyan,red,white "npm run start:api" "npm run start:ingest" "npm run start:intent" "npm run start:action" "npm run start:analyses" "npm run start:aggregator"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/web && pnpm install
scripts.db:seed: cd scripts && source ../.venv/bin/activate && PYTHONPATH=.. python seed_db.py

author: MailShieldAI Team
